title: andulolika
author: andulolika
created_time: October 20, 2022, 04:51:48 AMLast edit: October 20, 2022, 02:42:11 PM by andulolika
content: Two packs here so both sides can be seen, could take higher quality pictures if needed.Two of them are pure silver at 0.75 oz each.Two of them are made of ironOne is made of copperAnd the another of a alloyEach pair of two comes in a plastic capsule3 capsules in a small box along with a tiny book.They come as a set.I do not know the exact value of the set so feel free to research and offer, i do have a vague idea but sources differ.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Hi andulolika hope you're doing well. I think for that kind of items (specific for a country) here in bitcointalk "general" collectibles section there is not much interest. Try on Local Spanish board maybe, you can hope there is a collector ....However best option is to sell directly in a exhibition to some collector or try with ebay/del campe. I have not idea about the value of such type of coins... if these are valued more of 500/1000 euro best option is an auction house (cons ---> higher fees and expenses) since they provide guarantee for the product. The "pro" is that you will have the opportunity to sell quickly probably at the best rate possible with minimum effort.Of course lets wait other ideas/suggestion

comments.author: andulolika
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on October 20, 2022, 04:17:47 PMHi andulolika hope you're doing well. I think for that kind of items (specific for a country) here in bitcointalk "general" collectibles section there is not much interest. Try on Local Spanish board maybe, you can hope there is a collector ....However best option is to sell directly in a exhibition to some collector or try with ebay/del campe. I have not idea about the value of such type of coins... if these are valued more of 500/1000 euro best option is an auction house (cons ---> higher fees and expenses) since they provide guarantee for the product. The "pro" is that you will have the opportunity to sell quickly probably at the best rate possible with minimum effort.Of course lets wait other ideas/suggestion Doing well thanks and I expect same of you!Cheapest i found them on the internet was 30 eur, can go higher, 45 and such, however given amount of silver which is roughly 28 eur at this moment and that that site had only two pieces left, i do find them a bit more valuable.I do find joy in getting crypto for stuff, perhaps i will try the spanish forum, I don't have too many sets either but as collector i do like sharing doubles.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: since these are not rare there is not too much interest and it requires some time (weeks/months) before you can sell. for that amount (30/45 euro) most of the times it can be harder find a buyer, because it's more or less the value of metal itself...try on subforum for sure it will be more probability you can sell / try also to "exchange" with other items  maybe you can get some crypto collectible!
